summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EZJob AI-Powered Job Matching Platform. Backend APIs are 100% functional with all 16 endpoints passing tests. Frontend loads correctly with proper authentication, navigation, and data integration. LLM matching successfully created matches using GPT-5.2, and job ingestion from Remotive API is working.
passed_tests: GET /api/health returns 200 OK
GET /api/auth/me returns 401 when not authenticated
GET /api/auth/me returns 200 with user data when authenticated
POST /api/auth/logout returns 200 OK
GET /api/preferences returns default preferences for authenticated user
PUT /api/preferences updates user preferences successfully
GET /api/profile returns profile for authenticated user
PUT /api/profile updates candidate profile successfully
GET /api/dashboard returns funnel stats (3 matches, 22 jobs indexed)
POST /api/ingestion/run triggers job ingestion (fetched 22 jobs)
POST /api/matching/run creates matches using LLM (created 3 matches)
GET /api/matches returns match list successfully
POST /api/matches/{id}/action approve creates application attempt
POST /api/applications/{id}/mark-applied updates status to applied
GET /api/applications returns application list
Frontend login page loads with Google login button and proper styling
Frontend dashboard accessible with valid session showing real data
Frontend navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Matches, Preferences, Profile, Applications) working
Frontend displays actual job matches with scores (89, 80, 72) from LLM
Frontend shows proper funnel statistics integrated with backend data
Authentication flow working with session tokens
Dark theme and responsive design working correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (UI loading, navigation, authentication, data integration all working)
